g.text: stages: [compile, build, test, sast, quality, security, push, notify]
// All images from localhost:5001 (Nexus private registry)
‚Ä¢ All images sourced from Nexus private registry (localhost:5001) - NO Docker Hub access
‚Ä¢ 8-stage pipeline: compile ‚Üí build ‚Üí test ‚Üí sast ‚Üí quality ‚Üí security ‚Üí push ‚Üí notify
‚Ä¢ Technology support: Java, Python, Node, Go, PHP, .NET, Rust

svg.text: AI-Powered DevOps Platform | Pipeline Generation with Nexus Private Registry Integration
